tool_description: Merges multiple text documents or content chunks into a single unified document while preserving structure and handling formatting.

content_chunks.description: Array of text content to merge together

separator.description: Separator string to insert between merged content chunks

add_headers.description: Whether to add section headers for each merged chunk

remove_duplicates.description: Whether to remove duplicate content sections

error_messages: Insufficient content: At least 2 content chunks are required for merging.
Empty content chunks: One or more content chunks are empty or contain only whitespace.
Too many chunks: Maximum of 100 content chunks can be processed at once.
usage: Provide an array of content_chunks and configure merging options. The tool combines multiple text contents into a unified document.

merged_content.description: The combined text content from all input chunks

total_chunks.description: Number of content chunks that were merged

final_length.description: Character count of the merged content

duplicates_removed.description: Number of duplicate sections removed (if enabled)
